info.title: Hypersender WhatsApp API Docs
info.description:
The Hypersender WhatsApp API is a powerful api to send and recieve messages using your own whatsapp number.
Without the high costs of Meta's Whatsapp business API.

In this Docs you'll learn how to use and integrate Hypersnder Whatsapp API into your existing system/service or application using simple API endpoints.

**What you can Do?**

- Send Text and basic Url messages.
- Send Media through Link or uploaded file.
- Send Audio through Link or uploaded file.
- Send Contact Card
- Send Location
- Send Poll votes

**You can also**

- React to a message
- Forward messages to other chats
- Acknowledge messages (mark as read)
- Star and unstar messages


<hr />

**Quick Demo**

  **Learn how to use Hypersender whatsapp API to send a message using Postman:**
  [Demo Link](https://app.hypersender.com/send-whatsapp-message-in-postman) **to easily interact with our API.**

<hr />

**postman collection**

You can download our [Postman Collection](https://docs.hypersender.com/whatsapp-postman-collection.json) to easily interact with our API.

## Servers (Endpoints)

- Production (activated): [https://app.hypersender.com/api/whatsapp/v1](https://app.hypersender.com/api/whatsapp/v1)

post.description:
## Send Voice Message

This specialized endpoint will allow you to send voice as if you were recording directly in the WhatsApp application.

You can send files in two ways:

Provide a URL for the voice audio.

**Please note that the URL must be publicly accessible and not require any authentication or special headers to access the file.**

Send the voice audio it self as a file upload.

## Forward a Message

You can forward a message to another chat (that you chatted before, otherwise it may fail):

- Chat

- Group

- Recipient

parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: Instance UUID copied from hypersender dashboard

messages: The number you want to send the message to is not on whatsapp.
textMessage.text should not be empty

post.description:
## Send Seen Webhook

If you get a new message via  Webhooks and want to reply to that message, you need to first send that youve seen the message (double green tick).

parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: Instance UUID copied from hypersender dashboard

participant.description: Send seen for Group Message you need to provide participant field

messages: The number you want to send the message to is not on whatsapp.
textMessage.text should not be empty

post.description:
## Read messages

You can mark all unread messages in the chat as read (double blue checkmark) using one query:

Itll find all unread messages in the chat and mark them as read.

parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: Instance UUID copied from hypersender dashboard

parameters.name: messages
parameters.description: How much messages to read (latest first)

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: How much days to read (latest first)

messages: The number you want to send the message to is not on whatsapp.
textMessage.text should not be empty

post.description:
## Send Poll to Chat

You can create a poll in a chat.

## Send Contact Card in Chat

You can send a contact card in a chat in two ways:

- By providing the vcard:

example:
```json
  {
    "vcard": "BEGIN:VCARD\nVERSION:3.0\nFN:Jane Doe\nORG:Company Name;\nTEL;type=CELL;type=VOICE;waid=911111111111:+111111111111\nEND:VCARD"
  }
```
- By providing the contact info:

example:
```json
    {
      "vcard": null,
      "fullName": "john doe",
      "organization": "hypersender",
      "phoneNumber": "+1111111111111",
      "whatsappId": "911111111111"
    }
```

fullName.description: Full name of the contact | required without `vcard`

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the contact | required without `vcard`

delete.description:
## Delete message

You can delete messages from the chat.

so if you want to delete a message from a specific chat pass the `chatId` and `messageId` in the query parameters.

parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: Instance UUID copied from hypersender dashboard

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: ID of the message to delete

messages: The number you want to send the message to is not on whatsapp.
textMessage.text should not be empty

text.description: text should contain the url to send

preview_image_url.description: URL of the image to be used in the link preview - (only if preview_image_file is not provided)

preview_image_file.description: file of the image to be used in the link preview - (only if preview_image_url is not provided)

errors.description: Invalid or missing feilds will be shown here

messages: The number you want to send the message to is not on whatsapp.
textMessage.text should not be empty
